message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which we believe is an exceptional value at $2000000. This investment opportunity is not only lucrative but also has the potential to significantly impact your business positively. We look forward to discussing how this product can meet your needs and exceed your expectations.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product can bring to my business.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value it brings to your business, I propose a price of $1900000 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I still think the product is worth a bit less to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1750000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I can get from the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your offer, and I'm glad we're able to continue our discussion. After careful consideration, I'd like to propose a price of $1850000 for the product. This reflects the value it holds for both of us and allows for a mutually beneficial transaction.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, I'm still not convinced that $1850000 is the right price for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1725000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I can get from the product.

Thank you for your continued engagement, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to compromise further. Based on our discussions, I propose a final price of $1775000 for the product. This reflects the value it offers to your business while allowing for a fair transaction.

Thank you for your willingness to compromise, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I'm still a bit far from my target price. I'm willing to meet you at $1750000, but I need to get closer to my desired price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1725000 is a bit too high, but I could do $1720000. Can we meet at this price?

Thank you for your thoughtful response, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. In light of our ongoing negotiations, I am prepared to offer the product at $1740000. This price reflects the value of the product and allows for a fair transaction between us.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one final offer: $1700000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $1500000. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement, but I need to prioritize my budget.
